otherNames: King of Martial Arts, Banished Disciple's Counterattack Immortal and Martial Venerable Emperor,  灵武帝尊 선무제존
synopsis: Being kicked out by the sect? Being humiliated by fellows? And being alienated by my lover? None of those could stop me, even if my inner power pool is broken. Wait when I reach the top and become the king of martial arts!
